meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a glossary.
meanings.sent1: The glossarial terms helped me understand the book better.
meanings.sent2: The glossarial section at the back of the book listed all the important words.
meanings.sent3: I found the glossarial explanations quite helpful when studying.
meanings.sent4: Her glossarial knowledge was like a key that unlocked the meaning of the text.
meanings.sent5: The glossarial details painted a clear picture of the unfamiliar words.

meanings.definition: Contained in or consisting of a glossary.
meanings.sent1: The glossarial notes provided definitions for each term.
meanings.sent2: The glossarial entries were organized alphabetically.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled coffee on the glossarial page of the book.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a glossarial library filled with definitions.
meanings.sent5: The glossarial content made it easy to look up unfamiliar words.
